spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified predominantly as "High-Energy & Intense" due to the description mentioning "high-intensity intervals" and a maximum rhythm of 32, suggesting a fast-paced rowing session meant to push physical and mental limits. This is reinforced by the workout’s classification as a drive and having a maximum intensity level of 3 out of 3. The selection of music, featuring upbeat tracks like "Take My Breath" and "Stronger," further supports this intensity classification, matching a high-energy environment.

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is also significant, as the image shows rowing on a river. Although typically associated with outdoor space, the spirit is enhanced by the visual setting, even though emphasis remains slightly lower compared to the intensity focus.

The "Flow & Rhythm" spirit receives moderate attention because of the continuity implied by a structured workout sequence and the rhythmic nature of rowing along with pop and global hits music that supports a musical paced session. However, it is less dominant than the intense and outdoor aspects.
